abstract.description: An example workflow to produce CMS Run1 AODSIM enriched with tracker RecHits. All steps from event generation to reconstruction (step0-step2) are provided, including instructions how to store Tracker RecHit information from CMS full simulation events, and the tool to extract the information in a format appropriate to ML studies (step3) is included. The code can be run inside the CMS Open Data environment.

relations.description: The ouput dataset of this software tool is available in

system_details.description: Use this code with the CMS Open Data VM environment

title: TrackerRecHitProducerTool - Example workflow to add tracker hits to CMS Run1 AOD

usage.description:
If you do not have the CERN Virtual Machine for CMS open data installed, follow the instructions in step 1 at How to install a CERN Virtual Machine.

To run this workflow, follow the instructions in TrackerRecHitProducerTool GitHub documentationb.

use_with.description: Use this with Run1 QCD MiniAODSIM dataset enriched with tracker hits.
